/customers.description of use: returns list of all customers ids
/customers.if no data is found: 404 & Could not retrieve customers error from model
/customers.if error occured: Status 500 and Error retrieving data message from controller

/customers/sort/:column.required parameters: column, ?n=10&p=2: return n customer records, offset by p records
/customers/sort/:column.if no data is found: 404 & Could not retrieve customers error from model

/customers/:customer_id/current.description of use: get list of current rentals for customer
/customers/:customer_id/current.if no data is found: 404 & No current rentals message from model

/customers/:customer_id/history.description of use: get list of past rentals for customer
